name: AdOps Manager
description:
For more than 15 years, IPONWEB has been creating innovative projects that allow expanding opportunities in the field of media trading. We are world leaders among companies that create AdTech technologies and infrastructure.

The Ad Operations Specialist (AdOps) is responsible for advertising operations duties in projects like campaign management, performance optimisation etc.

This position combines the business and technical side of digital advertising and implies collaboration with the engineering team (mostly internal) and the business team (mostly on clients side) on a day to day basis.

The main goal of this role is driving clients revenue growth

Key Responsibilities:

  • Campaign management in 1st (IOW developed) and 3rd (e.g. DV360) party platforms;

  • Campaign management with xml (without UI);

  • Performance & yield management;

  • Responsibility for success of advertisers (campaigns) pool;

  • Brand safety management;

  • Troubleshooting (technical and business);

  • Supporting the Engineering team on business questions;

  • Proactive collaboration with engineering team on product development;

  • Work close with RnD team on platform optimisation;

  • Communicate with clients on adops related questions;

  • Maintain and optimize adops processes;

  • Take part in necommers onboarding;

Final list of responsibilities depends on the specific project.

Required Qualifications:

  • Strong knowledge of RTB ecosystem;

  • Solid understanding of performance and affiliate markets;

  • 3+ years of experience in digital advertising (adtech as an advantage);

  • Ability to manage multiple request at the same time / prioritization;

  • Account management or related experience with intensive client side communication;

  • Collaborative and interpersonal skills;

  • Creative critical thinking and problem solving skills;

  • Basic knowledge of HTML/JS/XML/SQL as an advantage;

  • Good oral and written English (upper-intermediate);

  • Technical background as an advantage;

  • Analytical thinking:

  • Ability to make data-driven decisions.

We offer you:

  • Career opportunity within High Tech international company - one of the leaders in the Programmatic Marketing industry;

  • Open and approachable management team with strong engineering DNA (80% of Moscow office - engineers, managers and executives with technical background);

  • Internal pathways for career development and professional growth, supported by Performance Management System;

  • Competitive compensation package;

  • Corporate Health Insurance Program or Voluntary Insurance Program (VMI);

  • Internal and external learning courses both for professional and soft skills development;

  • English Corporate Programs;

  • Relocation Program for you and your family from any region of Russia to Moscow office;

  • Full flexibility outside our core working hours 12:00-18:00;

  • Referral Bonus Program;

  • Recognition of employee milestones.

IPONWEB provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to sex, race, religion, national origin, age, sexual orientation, disability or genetics. In addition to federal law requirements, IPONWEB complies with applicable state and local laws governing non-discrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities.
